mdRecord.dcterms:title: Three maps of London, removed from an edition of William Maitland's The history of London from its foundation to the present time / B. Cole, sculp
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cole, B. (Benjamin) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Aldgate Ward, with its divisions into precincts & parishes according to a new survey (2 variants, 1 with plate no. 105) -- A new and accurate survey of the parishes of St. Andrews Holbourn, without the Freedom, St. George Queen Square, St. James Clerkenwell, St. Luke Old Street, St. Mary Islington and The Charterhouse Liberty (Plate no. 104) -- Portsoken Ward with its division into parishes according to a new survey (Plate no.114)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: London (England)--Maps
